messages.content: Dear Friend, In a few days those of you with a postal ballot will cast your vote in the General Election. This is my final, personal message to you before you make your choice. Thank you for the wonderful reception I have had from people in our area. It has been the privilege of my life to stand for the constituency where my family have grown up. Rushcliffe is my home and I will be glad to call you my neighbours on December 13th, win or lose.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Urgent action to tackle Climate Change.
Campaign to give the people a Final Say on arrangements to leave the European Union.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Vote for Liberal Democrats to stop Brexit. This election may be our final say. This may be your last chance to stop Brexit. We are the only party you can rely on to stop Brexit.

issues.brexitEurope: For three years, I have campaigned to give the people a Final Say on arrangements to leave the European Union. This election may be our final say. This may be your last chance to stop Brexit. We are the only party you can rely on to stop Brexit.
issues.environment: Urgent action to tackle Climate Change but first we must address the biggest issue of our times.

community.content: Thank you for the wonderful reception I have had from people in our area.

leaflet.personalStatement: Thank you for the wonderful reception I have had from people in our area. It has been the privilege of my life to stand for the constituency where my family have grown up. Rushcliffe is my home and I will be glad to call you my neighbours on December 13th, win or lose.

contactInformation.address: Published and promoted by Andy Wood on behalf of Jason Billin (Liberal Democrats) at 35 Salby Lane, Keyworth, NG12 5AQ.

examples: This is my final, personal message to you before you make your choice.
Thank you for the wonderful reception I have had from people in our area.
It has been the privilege of my life to stand for the constituency where my family have grown up.
Rushcliffe is my home and I will be glad to call you my neighbours on December 13th, win or lose.
For three years, I have campaigned to give the people a Final Say on arrangements to leave the European Union. This election may be our final say.
This may be your last chance to stop Brexit. We are the only party you can rely on to stop Brexit.
I believe that you should switch your vote to the Liberal Democrats and vote for me.
You may have voted for Labour and seen how that party’s chances have withered under Jeremy Corbyn.
If enough people like you lend us your vote, then we can make something special happen.
Thank you for the wonderful reception I have had from people in our area.
Urgent action to tackle Climate Change but first we must address the biggest issue of our times.
For three years, I have campaigned to give the people a Final Say on arrangements to leave the European Union. This election may be our final say.

personalStories.story: Thank you for the wonderful reception I have had from people in our area.

examples: I believe that you should switch your vote to the Liberal Democrats and vote for me.
This may be your last chance to stop Brexit. We are the only party you can rely on to stop Brexit.
You may have voted for Labour and seen how that party’s chances have withered under Jeremy Corbyn.
I understand that you may have voted for Ken Clarke in the past.
